Texto: 
right sided submandibular mass which was nontender, freely mobile and compressable.
patient was scheduled for a right sialodenectomy.
well defined 2.3 x 2.3 x 4.5 cm cystic mass arising from the region of the right sublingual gland.  the mass is t2 bright with t1 dark with peripheral enhancement after contrast.
ranula
ranula
abscess
salivary tumor
branchial cleft cyst
18 yo female with enlarging right sided submandibular mass.
